''Not only are they great to look at, Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler are long-time stars who have nothing to gain, or lose, by being part of American Idol. he could launch a bid for higher office. Mike Pence will speak in the Indiana State House Tuesday afternoon about the need for a more limited government and the importance of state government. This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to institutions resilient enough to lead America back, he will say, according to prepared remarks. ''I believe those are the institutions of faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism.''
